summary.para: Retrieves the underlying font set used by this list.

param.name: fontSet
param.para: The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to the font set used by the list.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Represents a list of fonts. IDWriteFontList2 adds new facilities, including retrieving the underlying font set used by the list.
